General.Name: Bandhan Bank Limited
General.Description: Bandhan Bank Limited provides commercial banking services in India. It operates through Treasury, Retail Banking, Corporate/Wholesale Banking, and Other Banking Business segments. The company accepts fixed and recurring deposits; and offers savings, and current accounts. In addition, it provides home, gold, personal, two-wheeler, and car loans; loans against property and term deposits; and loans for small, medium, and large businesses. Further, the company invests in sovereign securities; offers liability products, card services, internet and mobile banking, ATM, trading, and NRI services; and distributes third party products. Additionally, it provides mutual fund, money transfer, bill payment and recharge, debit and credit card, safe deposit locker, remittance, transaction banking, trade finance, and cash management services, as well as health, life, home, travel, property, and car insurance products. Bandhan Bank Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
